bibl.title: Der scribo behindert die Flotte des patricius. Ein Brief aus dem Dossier des Flavius Strategius Paneuphemos .
The Two Faces of Graeco-Roman Egypt. Greek and Demotic and Greek-Demotic Texts and Studies Presented to P.W. Pestman
bibl.author: HOOGENDIJK, Francisca A.J.

bibl.seg: HOOGENDIJK Francisca A.J., Der scribo behindert die Flotte des patricius. Ein Brief aus dem Dossier des Flavius Strategius Paneuphemos (= Pseudo-Strategius III).

A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT and S.P. VLEEMING (Edd.), The Two Faces of Graeco-Roman Egypt. Greek and Demotic and Greek-Demotic Texts and Studies Presented to P.W. Pestman = Papyrologica Lugduno-Batava. XXX (Leiden, 1998) pp. 21-35 et pll. II-III.
